dcterms:creator: Antoine Bordes
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: A synthetic goal-oriented multi-turn dataset consisting of 5 different tasks for restaurant booking with increasing levels of complexity. The dataset contains 1k dialogs with an average of 13 user utterances per dialog.
dcterms:title: bAbI dialog

dcterms:creator: Saizheng Zhang
Emily Dinan
Jack Urbanek
Arthur Szlam
Douwe Kiela
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: An open domain dataset with multi-turn chit-chat conversations between turkers who are each assigned a 'persona' at random. It comprises of 10.9k dialogs with an average of 14.8 turns per dialog.
dcterms:title: Persona Chat

dcterms:creator: Yanran Li
Hui Su
Xiaoyu Shen
Wenjie Li
Ziqiang Cao
Shuzi Niu
dcterms:description: An open domain dataset that consists of dialogs resembling day-to-day conversations across multiple topics. It comprises of 13k dialogs with an average of 7.9 turns per dialog.
dcterms:title: DailyDialog

dcterms:creator: H. He
A. Balakrishnan
M. Eric
P. Liang
dcterms:description: A multi-turn goal-oriented dataset where two agents must discover which friend of theirs is mutual based on the friendsâ€™ attributes. It contains 11k dialogs with an average of 11.41 utterances per dialog.
dcterms:title: MutualFriends
